querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo, A.APP_ID AS AppId, AC.CUST_NAME AS CustName, L.LEAD_NO AS LeadNo, L.LEAD_ID AS LeadId, A.TENOR AS Tenor, A.CURR_CODE AS CurrCode, A.ORI_OFFICE_NAME AS OriOfficeName, A.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, RM.DESCR AS OrderInfoName, StatDescr.DESCR AS Stat, CurrStepDescr.DESCR AS CurrStep, LastStepDescr.DESCR AS LastStep
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_ASSET AA WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AA.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LEAD L WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.LEAD_ID = L.LEAD_ID LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RM WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MR_ORDER_INFO_CODE = RM.MASTER_CODE AND RM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ORDER_INFO' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS StatDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_STAT = StatDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND StatDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND StatDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STAT' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS CurrStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_CURR_STEP = CurrStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND CurrStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND CurrStepDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STEP' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS LastStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_LAST_STEP = LastStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND LastStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND LastStepDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STEP'
